headline.main: Neutrality Act Held Crippling Nation's Power; Three Women's Organizations Urge Senate and House to Repeal Law

lead_paragraph: As tre neutrality repeal bill progressed in the Senate chamber go-ahead signals were flashed out last week to several women's organizations to make their opinions on the question felt in legislative circles.
abstract: Urges affiliates to back Neutrality Act repeal

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: WOMEN'S CLUBS, N Y C FED OF
